code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const TaskForm=_ref=>{let{addTask}=_ref;const[taskName,setTaskName]=useState('');const[error,setError]=useState('');const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();if(taskName.trim()===''){setError('Task name cannot be empty');return;}addTask({name:taskName});setTaskName('');setError('');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"task-form",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:taskName,onChange:e=>setTaskName(e.target.value),placeholder:"Enter task"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Add Task"})]}),error&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{style:{color:'red'},children:error})]});};export default TaskForm;
